original_text: That year they attacked the Israelites who lived in the Gilead region, on the east side of the Jordan River. That was the land where the Amorites lived. They were cruel to the Israelites for 18 years.
korean_text: 그 해에 그들이 요단 강 저쪽 길르앗에 있는 아모리 족속의 땅에 있는 모든 이스라엘 자손을 쳤으며 열여덟 해 동안 억압하였더라

sentences.original_text: That year they attacked the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 그 해에 그들은 이스라엘 사람들을 공격했습니다

sentences.original_text: who lived in the Gilead region
on the east side of the Jordan River
They were cruel to the Israelites
